lines.text:
[when asked the location of his earthly assignment by Mr. Jordan]
A place called New Jersey, sir - and if it can arranged, I would like a transfer!
I have an idea, Mr. Jordan, couldn't we have him reborn?
Nothing doing; I'm not gonna go through *that* again!
I don't want anybody's body. I want my body!

[Joe and Mr. Jordan are looking for a body for Joe to inhabit]
You can't palm off a second-rater on me. You gotta remember I was in the pink!
That is becoming a most obnoxious color, Joe.
I'm the one who says 'let's go'...
